td.content: s:patient presents with 15 months history of moderate shortness of breath. he is a 56 yr old white male painter. td.content: s:patient presents w/ c/o 3 weeks h/o moderate shortness of breath. patient is a 58 yr old m painter. o:Height 71 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN via non-rebreather mask, and ordered Arterial Blood Gas, duplex US of leg.
